name: The Realm Below
description:
You have been given the change to test your wits in the trials of The Realm Below. If you succeed, you become One. If you fail, who knows what will happen to you.

A game based loosely on the Jame Gam 15 theme, "No Going Back", you will only have one chance to complete each puzzle. Good Luck!

Normal Controls: WASD to move, E to interact, Space to jump.
